PhysicalTable.name: SAMP_EMPL_PARENT_CHILD_MAP
PhysicalTable.Description: Employee Parent Child Map: Stores the employee parent child information in a specific format that is required to create parent-child hierarchies within OBIEE. For every employee, it stores the complete hierarchical path upto the root node.

PhysicalColumn.name: Member_Key
PhysicalColumn.Description: Member Key: Stores the member key information as an integer

PhysicalColumn.name: Ancestor_Key
PhysicalColumn.Description: Ancestor Key: Stores the parent information as an integer

PhysicalColumn.name: Distance
PhysicalColumn.Description: Distance: Stores the distance between the employee and it's ancestor. The ancestor could be the immediate parent or any other parent up in the hierarchy.

PhysicalColumn.name: Is_Leaf
PhysicalColumn.Description: Is Leaf: Flag to indicate if a member is leaf or not. Possible values are 1 or 0.
